meanings.sent1: I will be deashing the fireplace tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys deashing the grill after a barbecue.
meanings.sent3: The deashing process turned into a fun game for the kids.
meanings.sent4: He deashed the memories of the past like clearing a dusty bookshelf.
meanings.sent5: The gardener deashing the flowerbeds made them look fresh and clean.

meanings.definition: The act of removing ash from something.
meanings.sent1: After the bonfire, the deashing of the pit took some time.
meanings.sent2: The deashing of the chimney is an important task in maintenance.
meanings.sent3: The deashing of the volcano was a messy but necessary job.
meanings.sent4: The deashing of the campfire revealed glowing embers beneath.
meanings.sent5: The deashing of the incinerator was a dusty and dirty job.
